email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope this message finds you well. We have a vessel available for your wheat shipment from Santos to Hamburg. The vessel, MV OCEAN HORIZON, has a DWT of 85000 and LOA of 300m. The laycan is set for 1st to 5th October, and the initial freight quote is USD45 per MT on CIF terms.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD42 per MT? Also, could you provide more details on the vessel's laycan and the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Sophia Martinez
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD43 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD15,000 per day. The laycan remains 1st to 5th October, and the loading window is 24 hours.

Please let me know if this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD43 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Sophia Martinez
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Santos on 1st October, with a 24-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Hamburg - Booking Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Sophia Martinez
Global Charterers
